extendedInfo.description: The legendary NEOGEO 2D action shooting masterpiece âMETAL SLUG 3â heads out to Android devices! Use various weapons and slugs to fight your way through and survive on the battlefield!!âNot only a perfect port of the original NEOGEO game!  In addition to its classic âARCADE MODEâ, this perfect conversion of âMETAL SLUG 3â includes a âMISSION MODEâ, allowing you to select in which stage you want to play!You can now train yourself in your favorite stages or those which give you a hard time! â Command many Slug vehicles like an ace!The Slugs are back and more colourful than ever, with Slug Mariners, Drill Slugs, and Elephant Slugs joining the original Metal Slugs and Slugnoids!!â Clear all routes via the branching map system!!A branching map system allowing you to take a different route to the end with each play-through, and an immense map of endless gameplay awaits you in âMETAL SLUG 3â!!âIntense cooperative gameplay via the Bluetooth function!  "METAL SLUG 3â can be doubly enjoyed by playing with another brother-in-arms simultaneously via the Bluetooth function! Will you be able to clear the hardest stages with your friends? âCompatible with âOpenFeint"!Complete the maximum number of âACHIEVEMENTSâ in order to increase your "METAL SLUG 3" Player Rank!Beat the best scores and become Worldâs Number 1!!

reviews.title: Fun but controls could be better
reviews.comment: The gameplay is good. However, the controls r not accurate and the buttons r way too big. Autofire is also a tad too fast.
reviews.author: Donald Tan

reviews.title: Great Port
reviews.comment: Great game. Yeah the amount of continues Suck but it\'s still fun. Maybe we could get a fix for that in an update. Please please do all of the versions of this game. This is still fun but my least favorite in the series
reviews.author: john koch

reviews.title: Almost perfect
reviews.comment: Good controls for a touch screen game amazing game  too! Wish it supported controllers it would be perfect then.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Dna controls
reviews.comment: THIS IS AWFUL.?!  The controls are so big you can\'t play the game! Please please fix if I can\'t get a refund....
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Controls suck on HTC one
reviews.comment: I got the game thinking to have lots of fun but can\'t even play update soon please
reviews.author: Giovanni Arias

reviews.title: Fix!
reviews.comment: One of my favorite game,  but wtf,  won\'t save past level 2!? Always gotta play from level 2, come on!  Fix!!!  Than I\'ll give u 5 star
reviews.author: David Seong

reviews.title: Good, but can better :)
reviews.comment: I love this game, it\'s good, but could be great with some improvements.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Horrible.
reviews.comment: There\'s no way you can play this, I\'m not sure I can get a refund for this utter s**t
reviews.author: Brandon Beauvais

reviews.title: Slow
reviews.comment: The app gets slow as hell when a lot of sprites are dispayed at the same time (playing on sgs2).  Controls are just as bad as any game that use overlay joysticks. A really bad port of the original game.
reviews.author: Ludwig Fiolka

reviews.title: Fun but
reviews.comment: It still needs some fixes. Allowed to continue for 5times only? That\'s something customers should decide, not by you. We should be able to put many coins as we can as we please. Also controls somewhat suck. It\'s hard to jump while shooting. Other then that, runs fine on Galaxy S3.
reviews.author: Julian Kim

reviews.title: No save past lvl 3?
reviews.comment: I give it a 3.5 only because lvl 3 stays locked even when I beat lvl 2. Can you please fix this! I would give it a five if this was no problem. Great game other wise.
reviews.author: Brian Beaty

reviews.title: Sad
reviews.comment: This was one of the best games i\'ve played since youth.  Back when I was using HTC One X, it was fine.  but since i\'ve changed to HTC ONE, the buttons and controls are screwed up.  Please fix this.
reviews.author: Vincent Leung

reviews.title: Great game
reviews.comment: Wow nostalgia factor. Game plays well with touch screen controls. Just as fun as the arcade version
reviews.author: Devon Simpson

reviews.title: Samsung Galaxy S4 GPe
reviews.comment: Buttons are way too big to play on 1080p phones.  This is one of my favorite games.  Please fix a.s.a.p.
reviews.author: Jeremy Maxwell

reviews.title: Sick game but
reviews.comment: Awesome game but no option to set control opacity to zero which is standard in android games because of those who use controllers. Also the gree icon blocks my health bar and wont go away very annoying tempted to download neo emulator because they are obscuring my gaming view with there bloat!
reviews.author: James Holt

reviews.title: waste of money!!!
reviews.comment: The buttons don\'t work right; the fire button doesn\'t shoot... It moves the stick forward instead!!!  Pause button doesnt work and the game frequently crashes.  If you want something more entertaining to do with your money, light it on fire...
reviews.author: Daniel Davis

reviews.title: The button are so huge
reviews.comment: The game is good but I can not play it because the buttons are so big that\'s takes all the screen on HTC ONE ... You need to fix that
reviews.author: Aymen Mahdi

reviews.title: Awesome game
reviews.comment: This game is so much fun. I just can\'t stop playing.
reviews.author: Akshay Kumar

reviews.title: Ruined by the controls
reviews.comment: I don\'t understand how anyone can play this game with onscreen controls. You need to move and shoot precisely to get anywhere but the onscreen make this impossible. You can\'t even for and jump at the same time.
reviews.author: Nick Darlow

reviews.title: LOVE THIS GAME
reviews.comment: Make more! Metal Slugs 4 5 6 7 X and XX :D 5 stars
reviews.author: Duke Kim
